item.title: Gazebo - I Like Chopin
item.description:
Remember that piano
so delightful unusual
That classic sensation
sentimental confusion
Used to say
I like Chopin
Love me now and again
oh oh oh oh oh
Rainy days
never say goodbye
To desire
when we are together
Rainy days growing
in your eyes
Tell me
where’s our way-

Imagine your face
in a sunshine
Reflection
a vision of blue skies
Forever distractions
used to say
I like Chopin
love me now and again
Oh oh oh oh oh
rainy days
Never say goodbye
to desire
When we are together
rainy days growing
In your eyes tell me
where’s our way-

Rainy days
never say goodbye
To desire
when we are together
Rainy days growing
in your eyes tell me
Where’s our way
rainy days
Never say goodbye
to desire
When we are together
rainy days growing
In your eyes tell me
where’s our way-
